content:
Hi I am trying to disable guest users from being able to send/receive messages. In organization permissions there is the option to disable it system wide but there is no granularity to just make this setting to apply to just guests in the UI. Is there a way to make this work? We are on version 4.3.
thanks.
@Pat Roam there isn't an option for this in master; you can follow https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/18110 for work towards supporting that feature.
Alya Abbott has marked this topic as resolved.
